## Bundle.BundleBuilder class

Builder for creating resource bundles from a ResourceManagerBuilder. Handles the compilation, configuration extraction, and integrity verification needed to create a complete, portable bundle.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BundleBuilder 
```

</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

Creates a resource bundle from a ResourceManagerBuilder using a predefined system configuration. This is a convenience method for the common case of using predefined configurations.
